config.enbeons_custom_books.title: Enbeon's Custom Books Config
config.enbeons_custom_books.option.modEn: If disabled, Enchanted Books use the default texture.
config.enbeons_custom_books.option.mendi: Controls whether the texture for Enchanted Books with Mending is animated.
config.enbeons_custom_books.option.prece: Each enchantment in the list takes priority over every enchantment below it. Enchanted Books take on the texture of their highest-priority enchantment.
